attributes.action: Replace the awful new London Olympics Logo with one for the people, designed by the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the new 2012 logo is an insult to the nation. As you said Mr Blair "When people see the new brand, we want them to be inspired to make a positive change in their life". Well we are doing just that! We are standing up against this travesty and wish to make a stand.
Let the people decide the logo! Its a games for the people remember? 
Let Blue Peter or a schools challenge to create what we need, not some over priced money grabbing PR company.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
